rows.label: qst201204_0010
rows.name: Um... Are you these children's father?

rows.label: qst201204_0020
rows.name: Yeah, that's right.

rows.label: qst201204_0030
rows.name:
What is it? Did my sons get themselves
into some kinda trouble ag-

rows.label: qst201204_0040
rows.name: T-Two Blades with eyepatches!

rows.label: qst201204_0050
rows.name:
W-What do you want? What are
you doing with my kids?!

rows.label: qst201204_0060
rows.name:
Is this gonna be okay? He doesn't
seem like he's in a talkin' mood.

rows.label: qst201204_0070
rows.name:
...Mikumari. Maybe we should
come back another time?

rows.label: qst201204_0080
rows.name: It'll be fine! It's just a quick chat.

rows.label: qst201204_0090
rows.name:
Please, listen to us! We wanted to
apologize for what happened...

rows.label: qst201204_0100
rows.name: Somebody! Somebody, get over here!

rows.label: qst201204_0110
rows.name: They're going to kill my children!

rows.label: qst201204_0120
rows.name: Wait a minute! We haven't done anything!

rows.label: qst201204_0130
rows.name:
Don't you come any closer! You
won't lay a hand on my kids!

rows.label: qst201204_0140
rows.name:
That's enough. If you keep this
up, I will not show mercy.

rows.label: qst201204_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Eek!

rows.label: qst201204_0160
rows.name: Stop it, Seori! He's just scared.

rows.label: qst201204_0180
rows.name: It's fine. Leave this to me.

rows.label: qst201204_0190
rows.name:
Please listen! We have no
intention of harming you-

rows.label: qst201204_0200
rows.name: You Blades! Don't move!

rows.label: qst201204_0210
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?!

rows.label: qst201204_0220
rows.name:
This situation has become
rather unpleasant.

rows.label: qst201204_0230
rows.name: I can see that...

rows.label: qst201204_0240
rows.name:
Th-Thank goodness! Quick,
capture those Blades!

rows.label: qst201204_0250
rows.name:
...It's them, all right. They're
the Core Crystal hunters.

rows.label: qst201204_0260
rows.name: To think they'd show up here...

rows.label: qst201204_0270
rows.name: Wait a sec! We're no' the likes of them!

rows.label: qst201204_0280
rows.name: There's another one with an eyepatch!

rows.label: qst201204_0290
rows.name: So it's a group of three...

rows.label: qst201204_0300
rows.name: That's no' what I meant!

rows.label: qst201204_0310
rows.name: We just came here to talk to this man!

rows.label: qst201204_0320
rows.name: Silence, you thieves!

rows.label: qst201204_0330
rows.name: ...This is perfect.

rows.label: qst201204_0340
rows.name:
We'll capture you all and
collect a handsome reward!

rows.label: qst201204_0350
rows.name:
What do we do, Mikumari?
They're ready to fight.

rows.label: qst201204_0360
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst201204_0370
rows.name:
Mikumari, Seori. At this rate,
they're not going to listen.

rows.label: qst201204_0380
rows.name:
Unfortunate as it is for them, it seems
we'll need to calm them down a bit.

rows.label: qst201204_0390
rows.name: You two, can you do it?

rows.label: qst201204_0400
rows.name: Yes, understood.

rows.label: qst201204_0410
rows.name:
Are you ready, Seori? We're
only incapacitating them.

rows.label: qst201204_0420
rows.name:
We have to show them clearly that
we're different from before.

rows.label: qst201204_0430
rows.name: Yes... Leave it to me.
